title: Proposal
text: Let's kick things off with a chat! This is where we sit down (or hop on a call) and talk about what you're envisioning for your website. Share with us your dreams, the cool features you want, and who you want to reach. I'll whip up a proposal that captures everything we discussed.

title: Refinement
text: Got feedback? Let’s hear it! This step is all about tuning into the finer details. Maybe you've had some new ideas or want to tweak a few things. No worries – together, we'll make sure everything is just right and on track. At this point you will get a quote for the project.

title: Content Collection
text: Content is the heart and soul of any website, so let's gather all the good stuff. Pictures, words, videos, or even doodles – let's get 'em. If you're feeling a bit stuck on what to create, I'm right here to give you a nudge.

title: Design & Development
text: After I get 50% of the quote, the cool part starts; I'll take all the content we've gathered and start building your website. I'll keep you in the loop every step of the way, so you can see your ideas come to life. Once I'm done, I'll send you a link to your shiny new website, ready for you to review.

title: Testing & Deployment
text: We're all about those finishing touches. We'll take your site for a test drive, making sure it looks and works great everywhere – on mobile, tablet, and desktops. Once I'm sure it's ready for the world to see and you're all set to go live, the remaining 50% of the invoice will seal the deal, and we'll hit that launch button!
